registerSchool.register-step-1: You are about to register your school.
registerSchool.register-part-2: Each school can install and register up to two devices, unless instructed otherwise.
registerSchool.register-step-2: Install Giga Meter on computers that are used frequently and connect only to the school’s internet.
registerSchool.register-step-3: If possible, ensure at least one computer connects to the Internet using a wired (Ethernet) connection.

searchCountry.country-not-accurate: It looks like the country you selected may not be accurate to your location.

searchSchool.provide-school-id: Please type and enter your school ID
searchSchool.user-has-not-id: Once you type your school ID we will search for ids that match with your input.

faq.what-is-school-id-desc: A school ID is a unique identifier for your school that was provided by the government. There are different formats, but it usually looks something like "BR12345" or "12345678"
faq.how-find-school-id: How do I find my School ID?
faq.how-find-school-id-desc: Ask your school administrator or IT department. The school ID will be the number that is used in your national registration system.
faq.school-id-not-found: My school is not part of {{appName}} yet. What can I do?
faq.school-id-not-found-desc: You can visit our website and fill out the contact form to indicate to us that you would like to join our initiative.
faq.can-close-app-desc: Yes, you can close the application by clicking the close button in the top right corner. The application will continue running in the background and will report your connectivity status.
faq.connectivity-checks-occur:
When do my school's
connectivity checks occur?
faq.connectivity-checks-occur-desc: Giga Meter runs up to four speed tests per day, and ping tests every 15 minutes. These tests occur between 8am and 8pm local time. If the device is offline or off, the checks will not run. You can trigger a manual test any time.
faq.can-change-id: Can I change my school ID?
faq.can-change-id-desc: Right now it is not possible to change your school ID. If you've made a mistake and need to enter a new ID, you should uninstall the application and start over.
faq.multiple-installs:
Can I install this application
on more than one computer?
faq.multiple-installs-desc: Yes you can. In fact, we encourage it. If multiple machines report data to the platform, the measurement will be more reliable.
faq.where-see-results: Where can I see past measurement results?
faq.where-see-results-desc-part1: You can view the last 10 successful tests in the measurement dashboard, under the "Data" page. Each day's results are averaged and published to Giga Maps. Visit
faq.where-see-results-desc-part2: to find your school and see how its connectivity compares globally.
faq.what-data-access: What kind of data does Giga Meter have access to?
faq.what-data-access-desc: Giga Meter only accesses system and network information needed to measure internet quality - such as connection speed, availability, network details, and device type. It does not access your personal files, browsing history, or content.
faq.who-has-access: Who has access to the measurement data?
faq.who-has-access-desc-part1: A subset of the data collected by Giga Meter- such as download speed, upload speed, latency, uptime and a unique school identifier- is made publicly available as part of Giga's open school connectivity dataset. This data is licensed under
faq.who-has-access-desc-part2: , allowing anyone to access, use, and share it freely. No personal data is ever shared.
faq.how-improve-access: How does Giga Meter help improve internet access?
faq.how-improve-access-desc: Giga Meter doesn't fix the internet directly, but it makes problems visible. This data helps governments and providers prioritize improvements where they're needed most.

app.project-connect-desc: {{appName}} automatically measures internet performance throughout the day, building a clear picture of connectivity in schools over time. The results are seamlessly synced with Giga Maps- a global, open map showing schools’ connectivity status in real time. Ensuring strong internet connections in schools supports Giga’s mission to connect all young people to information opportunity and choice.
app.thank-you: Thank you for contributing to {{appName}}. Find your school and learn more at our website. We add new schools every day!
app.device-id-copy-failed: Failed to copy Device ID. Please try again.

startTest.testFailedDesc: The connection was interrupted before testing could be completed. Try again.
startTest.backgroundMessage: The app will continue running in the background.
